overview_of_class: In this final course leading to the Public Relations Certificate, students analyze contemporary issues and case studies in strategic communication. Students will understand the structure of a communication operation, and will learn through research, planning, and execution in areas such as internal communication, crisis management, media analytics, and corporate social responsibility.
name: Public Relations Case Studies
title: DOHA IMC 332-0-70 Public Relations Case Studies
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for Juniors and Seniors who have taken IMC 330 or IMC 303 and IMC 331.
